oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Minnie Pearl with Jim Perkins and others at Zibart’s Book Store, 1954 January
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A scene from Minnie Pearl’s book signing, hosted at Zibart’s Book Store, circa January 1954. Sarah Ophelia Colley Cannon, known professionally as Minnie Pearl, was an American country comedian who appeared at the Grand Ole Opry for more than 50 years and on the television show Hee Haw from 1969 to 1991. The book signing event featured Minnie Pearl autographing copies of her book “Minnie Pearl’s Diary,” self-published in 1953. The Zibart Brothers Bookstore was owned and ran by Carl Zibart and his brother, Alan, located at 719 Church Street in downtown Nashville. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
